gw.cc.financials.bulkpay.entity

Interface BulkInvoice


  • public interface BulkInvoice
    BulkInvoice The top level entity for Bulk Pay.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acknowledgeSubmission()
      Acknowledges a message that this bulk invoice was submitted.

      Create a new BulkInvoiceItem and add it to the list on this invoice.

      Adds the given element to the InvoiceItems array.

      Adds a new BIValidationAlert to the bulk invoice with alertType and alertMessage.

      Note: This method should only be called from a rule in the Approval Routing ruleset.

      Tests whether this BulkInvoice can be stopped (only if it's been submitted to the downstream system).

      Tests whether this Bulk Invoice can be submitted for approval and final processing (i.e., its status is BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_DRAFT, it is valid and it has at least one BulkInvoiceItem).

      Tests whether this BulkInvoice can be validated (i.e., only if it has at least one BulkInvoiceItem and is not currently valid).

      If this BulkInvoice has a value of TRUE for 'SplitEqually', this method recalculates the amounts for each of the contained invoice items based on the TotalAmount entered for the Invoice.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyChangesAllowed

        void verifyChangesAllowed()
        Verifies that any changes on this bulk invoice are actually allowed. This should be called to check that all changes made in the UI are allowed to be committed, because an invoice's editability can change during a user's edit session. This method queries the databse to check that certain conditions for editability are still satisfied. If any conditions are violated, a UserDisplayableException is thrown. Conditions to check are:

        • The status of the bulk invoice did not change to cause it to become uneditable; typically this is caused by an escalation process changing the status to requesting.
        • If any payee-related fields (Payee, PayTo, MailTo, MailingAddress) are changed, this bulk invoice is still payee changeable, as determined by the isPayeeChangeable method.

      • addNewInvoiceItem

        BulkInvoiceItem addNewInvoiceItem()
        Create a new BulkInvoiceItem and add it to the list on this invoice. Also, if the BulkInvoice has a value of TRUE for spread evenly and a positive TotalAmount, then recalculates the sub amounts for each item in the invoice.
        Returns:
        The newly created Bulk Invoice Item.

      • isPayeeChangeable

        boolean isPayeeChangeable()
        Tests whether the payee is changeable for the Bulk Invoice. This is only the case if the bulk invoice is editable, and none of its associated checks have yet been escalated.
        Returns:
        true if the bulk invoice's payee is changeable, else false

      • isDeletable

        boolean isDeletable()
        Tests whether this BulkInvoice can be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if this BulkInvoice can be deleted, else false

      • isStoppable

        boolean isStoppable()
        Tests whether this BulkInvoice can be stopped (only if it's been submitted to the downstream system).
        Returns:
        true if the BulkInvoice is stoppable, else false

      • isValidateable

        boolean isValidateable()
        Tests whether this BulkInvoice can be validated (i.e., only if it has at least one BulkInvoiceItem and is not currently valid).
        Returns:
        true if the BulkInvoice is validateable, else false

      • isVoidable

        boolean isVoidable()
        Tests whether this BulkInvoice can be voided (only if it's been submitted to the downstream system).
        Returns:
        true if the BulkInvoice is voidable, else false

      • hasInvalidInvoiceItems

        boolean hasInvalidInvoiceItems()
        Tests whether this invoice currently has a status of BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_INVALIDITEMS.
        Returns:
        true if the invoice has the indicated status, else false

      • hasArchivedClaims

        boolean hasArchivedClaims()
        Tests whether any of the claims on this invoice have been archived.
        Returns:
        true if the invoice has any archived claims, else false

      • getSortedInvoiceItemsQuery

        IQueryBeanResult<BulkInvoiceItem> getSortedInvoiceItemsQuery()
        Returns a QueryProcesser representing the set of BulkInvoiceItems for this BulkInvoice sorted by the default order. Currently we sort by the BulkInvoiceOrder field as the default.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor to obtain the set of Bulk Invoice Items sorted by the Bulk Invoice Order.

      • getApprovedInvoiceItems

        IQueryBeanResult<BulkInvoiceItem> getApprovedInvoiceItems()
        Retrieves only the approved BulkInvoiceItems contained by this BulkInvoice. Note that this method currently does a direct query to the database, so it should only used used for a non-new invoice, and it will not return accurate results if one or more inserted/updated/removed invoice items are pending commit to the database.
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor encapsulating a query to retrieve only the approved invoice items for this invoice

      • getTotalAmountOfAllApprovedInvoiceItems

        CurrencyAmount getTotalAmountOfAllApprovedInvoiceItems()
        Retrieves the aggregate amount of all approved, submitted, and submitting invoice items on this bulk invoice. Note that this method currently does a direct query to the database for any non-new invoice, so in that case the returned amount may be inaccurate if this method is called after one or more BulkInvoiceItems have been added/update/removed and before a database commit.
        Returns:
        CurrencyAmount containing the aggregate amount

      • getDeductionsSum

        CurrencyAmount getDeductionsSum()
        Retrieves the sum of all deductions' amounts. Note that this method currently does a direct query to the database for any non-new invoice, so in that case the returned amount may be inaccurate if this method is called after one or more BulkInvoiceItems have been added/update/removed and before a database commit.
        Returns:
        CurrencyAmount containing the sum of deductions

      • recalculateSplitAmounts

        void recalculateSplitAmounts()
        If this BulkInvoice has a value of TRUE for 'SplitEqually', this method recalculates the amounts for each of the contained invoice items based on the TotalAmount entered for the Invoice. If the value of SplitEqually is FALSE, then this method does nothing.

      • delete

        void delete()
        Deprecated. This method is synchronous and may perform poorly for large invoices; use deleteAsynchronously instead()
        Deletes this BulkInvoice and all its contained BulkInvoiceItems. This method will throw an IllegalStateException if it is not in one of the following statuses:
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the BulkInvoice is not one of the following statuses:

        • BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_DRAFT
        • BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_INREVIEW
        • typekey.BulkInvoiceStatus#TC_PENDINGITEMVALIDATION
        • BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_AWAITINGSUBMISSION

      • deleteAsynchronously

        void deleteAsynchronously()
        Deletes the invoice. This operation is asynchronous; when this method is called, the invoice's status will be set to Initiating Delete. The InvoiceWorkQueue and InvoiceItemWorkQueue will process this invoice (delete its items) and eventually set its status to Retired.

      • isEditable

        boolean isEditable()
        Tests whether this BulkInvoice is editable. A BulkInvoice is editable if the status is any of the following:

        • BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_DRAFT
        • BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_INREVIEW
        • BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_AWAITINGSUBMISSION

        or, if the status is typekey.BulkInvoiceStatus#TC_PENDINGITEMVALIDATION and it's been marked as EditableWhilePending. This only happens if one or more BulkInvoiceItems were approved but then failed validation or their checks failed validation.

        Returns:
        true if this BulkInvoice is editable, else false

      • getOverrideTransToReportingExchangeRate

        boolean getOverrideTransToReportingExchangeRate()
        Returns whether this invoice has a custom exchange rate.
        Returns:
        true if this bulk invoice has a custom exchange rate, false otherwise.

      • setOverrideTransToReportingExchangeRate

        void setOverrideTransToReportingExchangeRate(boolean override)
        Specifies whether this invoice should use a custom exchange rate, and if so creates a new exchange rate if it does not already have on.
        Parameters:
        override - if true, uses a custom rate

      • getTransToReportingExchangeRateRate

        java.math.BigDecimal getTransToReportingExchangeRateRate()
        Returns:
        TransToReportingExchangeRate.Rate or null if TransToReportingExchangeRate is null

      • setTransToReportingExchangeRateRate

        void setTransToReportingExchangeRateRate(java.math.BigDecimal exchangeRate)
        Sets the Rate on the TransToClaimExchangeRate entity to exchangeRate. (Actually, a copy of the current TransToClaimExchangeRate will be made but with the new rate value.) The current TransToClaimExchangeRate must not be a market rate (its ExchangeRateSet must not be a market rate set; equivalently, OverrideTransToReportingExchangeRate must be true). The exchangeRate must be non-null; a null argument will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        exchangeRate - The exchange rate to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if TransToClaimExchangeRate is a market rate
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if TransToClaimExchangeRate is null

      • isPendingItemValidation

        boolean isPendingItemValidation()
        Tests whether this bulk invoice is currently undergoing final processing, wherein all the bulk invoice items are validated and associated placeholder checks are created.
        Returns:
        true if the BulkInvoice is currently in one of the states for work queue processing, else returns false

      • addValidationAlert

        void addValidationAlert(BIValidationAlertType alertType,
                        java.lang.String alertMessage)
        Adds a new BIValidationAlert to the bulk invoice with alertType and alertMessage.
        Parameters:
        alertType - type of alert
        alertMessage - message of alert

      • validate

        void validate()
        Performs validation on this BulkInvoice. After this method is called, the results can be checked via calls to the #isValid() and #getValidationAlerts() methods. If no validation plugin is registered, then the invoice will be automatically marked as valid.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Sets the BulkInvoice to be invalid and unapproved. This only has an effect on BulkInvoices that are currently valid.

      • submitForApproval

        void submitForApproval()
        Submits this Bulk invoice for approval. This is the pre-requisite for submitting the invoice for final processing, which will happen automatically once the invoice is approved.

      • updateBulkInvoiceStatus

        void updateBulkInvoiceStatus(java.lang.String checkNumber,
                             java.util.Date issueDate,
                             BulkInvoiceStatus status)
        Updates the status of the BulkInvoice and/or sets the check number or issue date. This method can set the BulkInvoiceStatus to one of the following:
        • TC_ISSUED
        • TC_CLEARED
        • TC_VOIDED
        • TC_STOPPED

        Use acknowledgeSubmission() to update from REQUESTING to REQUESTED status.

        Note: This method does not update the Status of any BulkInvoiceItem or any placeholder checks, except when uncancelling the BulkInvoice (e.g. update status from PendingVoid to Issued). If updating the BulkInvoice status, at the same time you should loop over all the placeholder checks for the BulkInvoice's Items and call check.updateCheckStatus() to update their statuses as well. That call will also update the BulkInvoiceItem status, if appropriate.

        Parameters:
        checkNumber - Check number to update, optional.
        issueDate - Date the check was issued.
        status - Status to update.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If bulk invoice status not in legal state

      • requestInvoice

        void requestInvoice()
        Deprecated. This method is synchronous and may perform poorly for large invoices; use requestAsynchronously() instead
        If the BulkInvoice is AwaitingSubmission with a scheduled send date of today, escalates the BulkInvoice's status to BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_REQUESTING which means that all associated and unsubmitted checks will also be requested.

      • requestAsynchronously

        void requestAsynchronously()
        If the BulkInvoice is AwaitingSubmission with a scheduled send date of today, escalates the BulkInvoice. This operation is asynchronous; when this method is called, the invoice's status will be set to Initiating Escalation. The InvoiceWorkQueue and InvoiceItemWorkQueue will process this invoice (escalate its items' checks) and eventually set its status to Requesting.

      • voidBulkInvoice

        void voidBulkInvoice()
        Deprecated. This method is synchronous and may perform poorly for large invoices; use voidAsynchronously instead()
        Marks the invoice and all associated approved InvoiceItems as PendingVoid, along with all associated checks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If invoice does not have a valid status for voiding the invoice

      • stopBulkInvoice

        void stopBulkInvoice()
        Deprecated. This method is synchronous and may perform poorly for large invoices; use stopAsynchronously() instead
        Marks the invoice and all associated approved InvoiceItems as PendingStop, along with all associated checks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If invoice does not have a valid status for voiding the invoice

      • voidAsynchronously

        void voidAsynchronously()
        Voids the invoice. This operation is asynchronous; when this method is called, the invoice's status will be set to Initiating Void. The InvoiceWorkQueue and InvoiceItemWorkQueue will process this invoice (void its items) and eventually set its status to Pending Void.

      • stopAsynchronously

        void stopAsynchronously()
        Stops the invoice. This operation is asynchronous; when this method is called, the invoice's status will be set to Initiating Stop. The InvoiceWorkQueue and InvoiceItemWorkQueue will process this invoice (stop its items) and eventually set its status to Pending Stop.

      • placeDownstreamHold

        void placeDownstreamHold()
        Marks the invoice as OnHold. Typically this method is only called from the associated API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If invoice is not in requesting or requested status

      • isBulkInvoiceValid

        boolean isBulkInvoiceValid()
        Tests whether this bulk invoice is currently valid (i.e., has been validated successfully and had no meaningful change since).
        Returns:
        true if this BulkInvoice is currently valid, else false

      • isSubmittable

        boolean isSubmittable()
        Tests whether this Bulk Invoice can be submitted for approval and final processing (i.e., its status is BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_DRAFT, it is valid and it has at least one BulkInvoiceItem).
        Returns:
        true if it can be submitted for approval and final processing, else false

      • setApprovingUser

        boolean setApprovingUser(User user,
                         Group group)
        Note: This method should only be called from a rule in the Approval Routing ruleset.

        Selects a user to approve the approval activity.

        Parameters:
        user - A user to be set as the individual who next needs to approve this Bulk Invoice
        group - A group to which this Bulk Invoice should be submitted for approval, typically one of the groups of the user.
        Returns:
        false if the user or group is null or retired; true otherwise.

      • approveByGroupSupervisor

        boolean approveByGroupSupervisor()
        Note: This method should only be called from a rule in the Approval Routing ruleset.

        Causes the approval activity to be sent to the supervisor of the group to which the exposure is assigned, if there is exactly one exposure, or the group to which the claim is assigned otherwise.

        Returns:
        false if the approving user would be the user who submitted the approval bean - if, for instance, the user were the supervisor of the group to which the claim/exposure is assigned, or if the claim and exposure are not yet assigned

      • approveByUserSupervisor

        boolean approveByUserSupervisor()
        Note: This method should only be called from a rule in the Approval Routing ruleset.

        Handles the use case of an approval working its way up the group chain.

        1. If submitting user is in the owning group and is not supervisor then approval goes to the group supervisor.
        2. If the group supervisor is the submitting user, then the approval escaates to the group supervisor of the next group up the tree.
        3. If the submitting user is a group supervisor somewher ein the upline, then the approval escalates to the supervisor of the next group up the tree.
        4. If the approval has worked its way up to the supervisor of the root group, then it is assigned to the default owner.
        5. Otherwise, if the submitting user is in one and only one group, then the approval goes to that group's supervisor. Otherwise, approval goes to the owning group's supervisor.
        Returns:
        false if assignment is unsuccessful, else true

      • getLastApprovingUser

        User getLastApprovingUser()
        The last user who approved this BulkInvoice.

        For example, if User A submits a BulkInvoice for approval, then the LastApprovingUser is User A. Suppose that BulkInvoice then requires approval by User B. When User B approves the TransactionSet, then the LastApprovingUser becomes User B. And so on . . .

        Note: This method should only be called from BulkInvoice Approval Routing and BulkInvoice Approval Rules. If this method is called from any other ruleset, it may throw an NPE.

        Returns:
        The last approving user

      • requireApproval

        boolean requireApproval(java.lang.String reason)
        Note: This method should only be called from a rule in the BulkInvoice Approval ruleset.

        Forces this BulkInvoice to require approval.

        Note: This method can only be called from rules.

        Parameters:
        reason - the reason(s) that approval is required
        Returns:
        True if bulk invoice requires approval

      • getApprovalHistory

        java.util.List<Activity> getApprovalHistory()
        Retrieves all the approval activities for this Bulk Invoice, typically so that a history view can be generated.
        Returns:
        a List of the approval activities for this BulkInvoice.

      • hasApprovalHistory

        boolean hasApprovalHistory()
        Determines whether there are any approval activities for this Bulk Invoice. This is the same as bulkInvoice.ApprovalHistory.HasElements, but is more efficient because it does not load any of the activity entities from the database.
        Returns:
        true if there are any approval activities, false otherwise

      • getBulkInvoiceAmountComponent

        IMutableMoney getBulkInvoiceAmountComponent()
        Returns the invoice amount and currency of this invoice, as an IMutableMoney.
        Returns:
        IMutableMoney representing this invoice's amount and currency

      • getApprovedCurrencyAmount

        CurrencyAmountPair getApprovedCurrencyAmount()
        Returns the currency and sum of all approved items' amounts of this invoice, as a CurrencyAmount.
        Returns:
        CurrencyAmount representing this invoice's amount and currency

      • getTotalCurrencyAmount

        CurrencyAmountPair getTotalCurrencyAmount()
        Returns the currency and sum of all items' amounts of this invoice, as a CurrencyAmount.
        Returns:
        CurrencyAmount representing this invoice's amount and currency

      • acknowledgeSubmission

        void acknowledgeSubmission()
        Acknowledges a message that this bulk invoice was submitted. Updates its status to REQUESTED. For each line item, updates its status to SUBMITTED if it was SUBMITTING, and acknowledges its placeholder check.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this invoice is not in REQUESTING status

      • retryProcessing

        void retryProcessing()
        Retries the recently failed operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this invoice is not in ERRORDURINGPROCESSING status

      • setBulkInvoiceTotal

        void setBulkInvoiceTotal(CurrencyAmount value)
        Sets the value of the BulkInvoiceTotal field.

      • getCurrency

        Currency getCurrency()
        Gets the value of the Currency field. Currency that the line items on this BulkInvoice should use.

      • setCurrency

        void setCurrency(Currency value)
        Sets the value of the Currency field.

      • addToInvoiceItems

        void addToInvoiceItems(BulkInvoiceItem value)
        Adds the given element to the InvoiceItems array. This is achieved by setting the parent foreign key to this entity instance.

      • removeFromInvoiceItems

        void removeFromInvoiceItems(BulkInvoiceItem value)
        Removes the given element from the InvoiceItems array. This is achieved by marking the element for removal.

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(BulkInvoiceStatus value)
        Sets the value of the Status field.

      • setCheckNumber

        void setCheckNumber(java.lang.String value)
        Sets the value of the CheckNumber field.

      • setScheduledSendDate

        void setScheduledSendDate(java.util.Date value)
        Sets the value of the ScheduledSendDate field.

      • setIssueDate

        void setIssueDate(java.util.Date value)
        Sets the value of the IssueDate field.
